issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: We introduced a parent-check/glob-check/file-check in SQLAuthorizationUtils in HIVE-10022, but the logic for that is more convoluted than it needs to be. Taking a cue off RANGER-1126 , we should simplify this.
fields.summary: Simplify logic for check introduced in HIVE-10022

comments.body:

No, they weren't related, but at the time the test framework was having wonky runs, so I wanted to make sure that we reran tests at some point before committing.
